title: [Gameplay] Riven's Ult Taunt not playing correctly.
body:
When Riven uses her /taunt during ult she says "a broken blade is more than enough for the likes of you." She is supposed to say "You are beyond redemption." 

This has been broken for several patches now.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! I can take a look today and see why it's not playing.
